title: [Large-Scale] Game-Based Business Language Leadership Program

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-intermediate language proficiency and basic leadership experience as a manager
context.additional_context: Need for personalized activity design reflecting individual learners' gaming preference differences

learning_goals: Students can distinguish and apply at least three effective communication strategies in game-based scenarios.
Students can demonstrate culturally sensitive language use in global business negotiation situations through role-playing games.
Students can perform a leadership role in team-based game projects and utilize at least two motivational techniques for goal achievement.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
